name: media-query-splitting-plugin
description: Webpack 4 plugin for styles splitting by media query

scripts.minify: minify ./dist/index.js -d ./dist && minify ./dist/getOptions.js -d ./dist && minify ./dist/handleApplyNew.js -d ./dist && minify ./dist/handleApplyOld.js -d ./dist && minify ./dist/splitByMediaQueryNew/index.js -d ./dist/splitByMediaQueryNew && minify ./dist/splitByMediaQueryNew/matchMedia.js -d ./dist/splitByMediaQueryNew && minify ./dist/splitByMediaQueryOld/index.js -d ./dist/splitByMediaQueryOld && minify ./dist/splitByMediaQueryOld/matchMedia.js -d ./dist/splitByMediaQueryOld
scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run minify

author: Mike Diamond
